example.name: both args
example.text: Then there is the artifical sea wall, 600 yards long and 60 yards thick, jutting into the ocean.

example.name: just jutter
example.text: Jutting out just to the north of us is the Blackjack Peninsula (after the oak, not the game) which forms the core of the Aransas Wildlife Refuge.
